name: cmc_compare_coins
description: Compare multiple cryptocurrencies side by side by scraping their CoinMarketCap pages in parallel. Returns price, market cap, volume, and price changes for each coin.

detailSteps.code: const nameEl = document.querySelector('[data-role="coin-name"], h1 span, h2[class*="name"]'); const symbolEl = document.querySelector('[data-role="coin-symbol"], .nameSymbol, small, span[class*="symbol"]'); const priceEl = document.querySelector('[data-test="text-cdp-price-display"], [class*="priceValue"] span, .priceValue span'); const changeEl = document.querySelector('[data-test="text-cdp-price-change"], [class*="priceChange"], [class*="change24h"]'); const bodyText = document.body.innerText; const mcMatch = bodyText.match(/Market [Cc]ap[^$]*?(\$[\d,.]+[BMTK]?)/); const volMatch = bodyText.match(/Volume \(24h\)[^$]*?(\$[\d,.]+[BMTK]?)/); const supMatch = bodyText.match(/Circulating Supply[^\d]*([\d,.]+\s*[A-Z]*)/); const rankMatch = bodyText.match(/Rank\s*#?(\d+)/i); return { name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', symbol: symbolEl ? symbolEl.textContent.trim() : '', price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', change_24h: changeEl ? changeEl.textContent.trim() : '', market_cap: mcMatch ? mcMatch[1] : '', volume_24h: volMatch ? volMatch[1] : '', circulating_supply: supMatch ? supMatch[1] : '', rank: rankMatch ? '#' + rankMatch[1] : '', url: window.location.href }
detailSteps.name: coin_data
detailSteps.label: Extract coin data
